name: Face Match
description:
Make every face match the others in the same group.

The faces change picture - tap any face to lock it in.  Tap the rest of the group when that face appears to match that one.  Complete all the groups before time runs out.

  • Level 1:  7 Groups of 3 faces each.
  • Level 2: 6 Groups of 4 faces each.
  • Level 3: 6 Groups of 5 faces each.
  • Level 4: 6 Groups of 6 faces each

There are sound effects but no music.  By default the sound effects are on.  Depending on your browser settings you might not have sound or an alert that the sound muted by the browser.
